extendedInfo.description: Save Time, Save Money & Share Your Taxi!Taxi Share Chicago allows you to easily and quickly share a taxi with someone else going to the same popular destination (Wrigley Field, U.S. Cellular, Downtown, O'Hare, Midway, etc.).How it works: Select your destination, look for others on the map going to the same place (each traveler is represented by a color coded dot corresponding to their destination).  Tap their dot/icon and a chat window will appear.  Exchange a quick text to confirm your desire to share the ride and that's it!  Whoever hails a cab first picks up the other person! The first time you use the app, you will be asked to enter a first name or alias that you can change anytime using the menu function.Extras:The menu function will allow you to call a cab company directly, turn your phone into a flashing beacon (signaling your color coded destination) and allow you to input your favorite destinations.

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Screen updating takes minutes if at all, doesn\'t allow you to enter start/ end destinations, only predefined, and what it thinks is your location.  Its garbage. What a waste of a good idea.
reviews.author: Marty Seitzinger

reviews.title: Cool idea....give it a try
reviews.comment: Cool app idea, give it a try...the more of us that us it the better the service will be.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ecologically Responsible!
reviews.comment: I can\'t think of a more ecologically responsible and aware way to get to where I am going. Not only can I save money by sharing a cab, but I am using half the gas to get there! Brilliant!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Total failure
reviews.comment: Does not do anything.  I wonder how the developer got on CBS Chicago news.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I called cab from taxi-share ... cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great app! I shared a cab with my friend on the way to downtown. He was happy to get a taxi so quickly from me:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A great idea. But i\'ve never seen anyone else on it, making it useless

reviews.title: I use this app all the time now...
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time now... Great for us Hyde Parkers/U of C folks heading downtown!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app. Great to have all the taxi contact info at your finger tips.

reviews.comment: So dumb...I dont need a color to flash on my phone to get a cab, I need a #!!

reviews.title: Still a Great Idea
reviews.comment: New upgrades are awesome! Now I can pick up fellow passengers going to O\'Hare and save $20!

reviews.title: Great Concept!
reviews.comment: Love the concept! Hope more people will download so I can see it in action!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a safe idea
reviews.comment: Think about it for a min you don\'t know who your sharing a cab with could be a stalker and alot of times your taking and showing people where you LIVE! Not smart
reviews.author: A Google User
